Package diceTools

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConcreteProbMap<K>
    Concrete class implementing ProbMap without adding any functionality.
    DiceFileTools
    Provides methods to save and load key-value pairs in files.
    DiceFileTools.EntryIterable<T>  
    DiceFileTools.EntryIterator<T>  
    DiceNumber
    Number which can store either an int or double, and which is aware of the data representation of the number it stores.
    DiceNumber.DiceDouble
    DiceNumber which stores its number internally as a double
    DiceNumber.DiceInteger
    DiceNumber which stores its number internally as an int
    DicePoolMap
    Implementation of ProbMap with List<DiceNumber> values used for event keys.
    DiceRollIterable
    Generates iterators to iterate all possible combinations of dice rolls.
    DiceRollMap
    Implementation of ProbMap with DiceNumber values used for event keys.
    ImmutableList<T>
    List implementation which does not allow any modification to the contents or structure of the list after construction.
    ProbMap<K>
    Stores the probabilities of observing discrete events (such as dice rolls or darts scores).
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DiceFileTools.EntryIterator.InvalidKeyStringException  
    ProbMap.InvalidKeyException
    Exception to be thrown upon receiving an invalid key
